name: Testimonials 19
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign slide_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical
  assign slide_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_radius = section.settings.slide_radius
  assign slide_shadow = section.settings.slide_shadow

  assign image_text_custom = section.settings.image_text_custom
  assign image_text_font = section.settings.image_text_font
  assign image_text_size = section.settings.image_text_size
  assign image_text_size_mobile = section.settings.image_text_size_mobile
  assign image_text_height = section.settings.image_text_height

  assign review_text_custom = section.settings.review_text_custom
  assign review_text_font = section.settings.review_text_font
  assign review_text_size = section.settings.review_text_size
  assign review_text_size_mobile = section.settings.review_text_size_mobile
  assign review_text_height = section.settings.review_text_height
  assign review_text_mt = section.settings.review_text_mt
  assign review_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.review_text_mt_mobile

  assign author_image_size = section.settings.author_image_size
  assign author_image_size_mobile = section.settings.author_image_size_mobile
  assign author_image_border_thickness = section.settings.author_image_border_thickness
  assign author_image_mt = section.settings.author_image_mt
  assign author_image_mt_mobile = section.settings.author_image_mt_mobile

  assign review_author_custom = section.settings.review_author_custom
  assign review_author_font = section.settings.review_author_font
  assign review_author_size = section.settings.review_author_size
  assign review_author_size_mobile = section.settings.review_author_size_mobile
  assign review_author_height = section.settings.review_author_height
  assign review_author_mt = section.settings.review_author_mt
  assign review_author_mt_mobile = section.settings.review_author_mt_mobile

  assign info_text_custom = section.settings.info_text_custom
  assign info_text_font = section.settings.info_text_font
  assign info_text_size = section.settings.info_text_size
  assign info_text_size_mobile = section.settings.info_text_size_mobile
  assign info_text_height = section.settings.info_text_height

  assign info_subtext_custom = section.settings.info_subtext_custom
  assign info_subtext_font = section.settings.info_subtext_font
  assign info_subtext_size = section.settings.info_subtext_size
  assign info_subtext_size_mobile = section.settings.info_subtext_size_mobile
  assign info_subtext_height = section.settings.info_subtext_height
  assign info_subtext_mt = section.settings.info_subtext_mt
  assign info_subtext_mt_mobile = section.settings.info_subtext_mt_mobile

  assign stars_size_mobile = section.settings.stars_size_mobile
  assign stars_size = section.settings.stars_size
  assign stars_icon = section.settings.stars_icon

  assign buttons_mt = section.settings.buttons_mt
  assign buttons_mt_mobile = section.settings.buttons_mt_mobile
  assign buttons_gap = section.settings.buttons_gap
  assign buttons_gap_mobile = section.settings.buttons_gap_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ image_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ review_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ review_author_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ info_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ info_subtext_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .testimonials-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ slide_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    height: auto !important; 
    box-sizing: border-box !important
  }

  .testimonials-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
  }

  .testimonials-image-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ image_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ image_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: center;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ review_text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ review_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ review_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;        
    text-align: center;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    margin-top: {{ author_image_mt_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ author_image_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ author_image_size_mobile }}px;
    border-width: {{ author_image_border_thickness }}px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-decoration: none;
    overflow: hidden;          
  }

  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;     
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ review_author_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ review_author_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ review_author_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;        
    text-align: center;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ info_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ info_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;        
    text-align: center;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ info_subtext_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ info_subtext_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ info_subtext_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;        
    text-align: center;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ buttons_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ buttons_gap_mobile }}px;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
  
    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
      padding-left: 0rem !important;
      padding-right: 0rem !important;
      margin-left: 0rem !important;
      margin-right: 0rem !important;
    }

    .testimonials-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-image-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ image_text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ review_text_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ review_text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ info_text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ info_subtext_mt }}px;
    } 

    .testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ info_subtext_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ review_author_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ review_author_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ author_image_mt }}px;
      width: {{ author_image_size }}px;
      height: {{ author_image_size }}px;    
    }

    .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ buttons_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ buttons_gap }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-image-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ image_text_font.family }}, {{ image_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ image_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ image_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if review_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ review_text_font.family }}, {{ review_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ review_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ review_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if review_author_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ review_author_font.family }}, {{ review_author_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ review_author_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ review_author_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if info_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ info_text_font.family }}, {{ info_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ info_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ info_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if info_subtext_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ info_subtext_font.family }}, {{ info_subtext_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ info_subtext_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ info_subtext_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_shadow %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-top: 10px !important;
      padding-bottom: 10px !important;
    }
    
    .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: 0 0 #0000,0 0 #0000,0 0 10px #0000001a;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-left: 5px !important;
        padding-right: 5px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'image' %}
      <style>

        .testimonials-image-{{ block.id }} {
          position: relative;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          text-decoration: none;
          overflow: hidden;          
        }

        .testimonials-image-{{ block.id }}:after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          background-color: {{ block.settings.image_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: block.settings.image_overlay }};
          z-index: 1;
        }

        .testimonials-image-{{ block.id }} img,
        .testimonials-image-{{ block.id }} svg {
          display: block;     
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover;
        }

        .testimonials-image-{{ block.id }} svg {
          background-color: #AFAFAF;
        }

        .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} {
          position: absolute;
          top: 50%;
          left: 50%;
          z-index: 2;
          transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
          width: 95%;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
        }
      </style>  

    {% when 'review' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.author_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .testimonials-slide-{{ block.id }} {
          background-color: {{ block.settings.block_bg_color }};
        }
        
        .testimonials-slide-content-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          height: 100%;
        }

        .testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 1px;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
          max-width: fit-content;
        }

        .testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }} svg,
        .testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }} img {
          display: block;
          width: {{ stars_size_mobile }}px;
          height: {{ stars_size_mobile }}px;
          object-fit: cover;
        }        

        .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};         
        }

        .testimonials-author-image-{{ block.id }} {
          border-color: {{ block.settings.image_border_color }};      
        }

        .testimonials-author-{{ block.id }} {
          color: {{ block.settings.author_color }};
        }

        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }} svg,
          .testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }} img {
            width: {{ stars_size }}px;
            height: {{ stars_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

    {% when 'text' %}
      <style>

        .testimonials-slide-{{ block.id }} {
          background-color: {{ block.settings.block_bg_color }};
        }

        .testimonials-slide-content-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          height: 100%;
        }

        .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
        }

        .testimonials-subtext-{{ block.id }} * {
          color: {{ block.settings.sub_text_color }};
        }

        .testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }} {          
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.logo_mt_mobile }}px;
          position: relative;
          width: {{ block.settings.logo_width_mobile }}%;
          text-decoration: none;
          overflow: hidden;    
        }

        .testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }} img,
        .testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }} svg {
          display: block;     
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover; 
        }

        .testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }} svg {
          background: #AFAFAF;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {

          .testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.logo_mt }}px;
            width: {{ block.settings.logo_width }}%; 
          }
        }
      </style>
      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}


{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 

    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} testimonials-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          {{ heading }}
        </div>  
      {% endif %}
      <div class="testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper">
        <div class="testimonials-wrapper-{{ section.id }} swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% case block.type %}
              {% when 'image' %}
                <div class="testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} testimonials-slide-image-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <div class="testimonials-image-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>      
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %} 
                  </div>
                  <p class="testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} testimonials-image-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                </div>

              {% when 'review' %}
                <div class="testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} testimonials-slide-{{ block.id }}  testimonials-slide-text-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <div class="testimonials-slide-content-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.stars_count != 0 %}
                      <div class="testimonials-stars-{{ block.id }}">
                        {% if stars_icon != blank %}
                          {% assign stars_count_round = block.settings.stars_count | round: 0 %}
                          {% for item in (1..stars_count_round) %}
                            <img src="{{ stars_icon | image_url }}" alt="{{ stars_icon.alt }}">
                          {% endfor %}
                        {% else %}
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                            {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1  %}
                              <defs>
                                <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}6">
                                  <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                  <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                </linearGradient>
                              </defs>
                            {% endif %}
                            <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}stroke="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}6){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 0.5 %}{{ block.settings.stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                          </svg>
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                            {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2  %}
                              <defs>
                                <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}7">
                                  <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                  <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                </linearGradient>
                              </defs>
                            {% endif %}
                            <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}stroke="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}7){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 1.5 %}{{ block.settings.stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                          </svg>
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                            {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3  %}
                              <defs>
                                <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}8">
                                  <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                  <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                </linearGradient>
                              </defs>
                            {% endif %}
                            <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}stroke="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}8){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 2.5 %}{{ block.settings.stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                          </svg>
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                            {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}
                              <defs>
                                <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}9">
                                  <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                  <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                </linearGradient>
                              </defs>
                            {% endif %}
                            <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}stroke="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}9){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 3.5 %}{{ block.settings.stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                          </svg>
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                            {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}
                              <defs>
                                <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}10">
                                  <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}" />
                                  <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                  <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                </linearGradient>
                              </defs>
                            {% endif %}
                            <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}stroke="{{ block.settings.stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}10){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 4.5 %}{{ block.settings.stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                          </svg>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                    <div class="testimonials-author-image-{{ block.id }} testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>      
                      {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %} 
                    </div>
                    {% if block.settings.author != blank %}
                      <p class="testimonials-author-{{ block.id }} testimonials-author-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.author }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                  
                </div>

              {% when 'text' %}
                <div class="testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} testimonials-slide-{{ block.id }} testimonials-slide-text-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                  <div class="testimonials-slide-content-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} testimonials-info-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}                    
                    {% if block.settings.sub_text != blank %}
                      <div class="testimonials-subtext-{{ block.id }} testimonials-info-subtext-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sub_text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}                    
                    <div class="testimonials-logo-{{ block.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.logo != blank %}
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.logo | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.logo.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>      
                      {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %} 
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
               
            {% endcase %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <button class="testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>   
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initTestimonials19() {
    document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper(".testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 500,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }},
        }
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initTestimonials19);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initTestimonials19);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initTestimonials19);
  }
</script>
